name: optseq2
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description: Optseq2 is a tool for automatically scheduling events for rapid-presentation event-related (RPER) fMRI experiments.

inputs.description: Number of time points to be acquired during the scan.
inputs.name: Number of Time Points

inputs.description: Temporal resolution of acquisition in seconds.
inputs.name: Temporal Resolution

inputs.description: Start events t seconds before first acquisition.
inputs.name: Pre-scan Time

inputs.description: Post-stimulus window specifications: minimum PSD, maximum PSD, and optional dPSD.
inputs.name: PSD Window

inputs.description: Event type specification with label, duration, and number of repetitions.
inputs.name: Event

inputs.description: Allow number of repetitions of event types to vary by percentage, optionally per event.
inputs.name: Repetition Variation

inputs.description: Add polynomial regressors as nuisance variables of specified order.
inputs.name: Polynomial Fit Order

inputs.description: Minimum duration of null time between stimuli in seconds.
inputs.name: Minimum Null Duration

inputs.description: Maximum duration of null time between stimuli in seconds.
inputs.name: Maximum Null Duration

inputs.description: Search over a specified number of iterations for schedules.
inputs.name: Number of Searches

inputs.description: Search for schedules over a specified number of hours.
inputs.name: Search Time

inputs.description: Pre-optimize first order counter-balancing.
inputs.name: First Order Counter-Balancing

inputs.description: Optimize assuming whitening with AR1 parameter
inputs.name: AR1 Parameter

inputs.description: Penalize for presentations being too close with parameters alpha, T, and dtmin.
inputs.name: Presentation Penalty

inputs.description: Contrast of event types with weights.
inputs.name: Event Contrast

inputs.description: Load contrast from ASCII matrix file.
inputs.name: Contrast Matrix

inputs.description: Specify cost function and its parameters.
inputs.name: Cost Function

inputs.description: Sum delays when forming contrast matrix.
inputs.name: Sum Delays

inputs.description: Initialize random number generator with seed value.
inputs.name: Random Seed

inputs.description: Number of best schedules to keep.
inputs.name: Number Keep

inputs.description: Output stem for saved schedules.
inputs.name: Output Stem

inputs.description: Output stem for saved design matrices.
inputs.name: Matrix Stem

inputs.description: File for saving contrast matrix.
inputs.name: Contrast Matrix File

inputs.description: File for saving search summary.
inputs.name: Summary File

inputs.description: File for saving log information.
inputs.name: Log File

inputs.description: Percentage interval after which progress is logged.
inputs.name: Percent Update

inputs.description: File to save information from each iteration.
inputs.name: Save Iteration Information

inputs.description: Initialize with input schedules that match instem-RRR.par.
inputs.name: Input Stem

inputs.description: Input schedule files.
inputs.name: Input Schedule

inputs.description: Do not perform search for optimal schedules.
inputs.name: No Search Flag

inputs.description: Print help page.
inputs.name: Help Flag

inputs.description: Print version string.
inputs.name: Version Flag
